decision_conditions: The proposed amendments cannot be accepted as a minor material amendment to planning permission ref. 222586FUL dated 09/08/2022 in accordance with S73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for Minor Material Amendments following grant of planning permission (2015) as the changes to the approved permission would result in a design, scale and bulk that would be materially detrimental to the architectural integrity of the approved development and the visual amenity of the local character. The proposed amendment would therefore be contrary to policies D4 of the London Plan (2021),  policies 7.4 of the  Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), Policy D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and of the  Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans), seeking to allow changes on the design, in pursuant to planning permission reference 222586FUL dated 09/08/2022 for'' Construction of two semi-detached two-storey dwellinghouses (with habitable space within the roofspace) with associated integral orangery and outbuildings to both properties (following demolition of existing dwellinghouse)''
